price: Kuri uwo musi, ivugira ry’umuntu ku caha yakoze, nta co rizoba rimaze kiretse ivugira ry’uwahawe uburenganzira na Nyenimpuhwe Allah, maze Agashima ivugira ryiwe[397].
arabic: يَوۡمَئِذٖ لَّا تَنفَعُ ٱلشَّفَٰعَةُ إِلَّا مَنۡ أَذِنَ لَهُ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ وَرَضِيَ لَهُۥ قَوۡلٗا
footnotes: [397] Ukuvugira uwundi ku musi w’izuka ku vyaha yakoze, kuzorekurirwa gusa umwemeramana vy’ukuri.

meta.transliteration: yawma-idhin lā tanfaʿu al-shafāʿatu illā man adhina lahu al-raḥmānu waraḍiya lahu qawlan
